SELECT t.id, t.work_order_num as workOrderNum, t.title, t.email_content as emailContent, t.send_status as sendStatus, t.is_delay as isDelay, t.delay_send_time as delaySendTime, t.send_time as sendTime, t.attachment, t.created_time as createdTime, t.creator, t.userNames FROM (SELECT t1.id, t1.work_order_num, t1.title, t1.email_content, t1.send_status, t1.is_delay, t1.delay_send_time, t1.send_time, t1.attachment, t1.created_time, (SELECT `name` FROM tb_sys_user WHERE account = t1.creator_account ) as creator, GROUP_CONCAT(t2.`name`) as userNames FROM tb_oa_email t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT t.id, t.account, t.`name`, tt.email_id FROM tb_sys_user t, tb_oa_email_user tt WHERE t.account = tt.user_account AND t.record_status = 1 AND tt.record_status = 1 ) t2 ON t1.id = t2.email_id WHERE t1.record_status = 1 GROUP BY t1.id) t
t.title like CONCAT('%', #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
t.creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t.send_status = #{sendStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY t.created_time DESC ,id DESC

SELECT t1.id, t1.work_order_num, t1.title, t1.email_content, t1.send_status, t1.is_delay, t1.attachment, t1.delay_send_time, t1.send_time, t1.created_time, t1.creator, t1.departName, t2.id AS userId, t2.account, t2.`name`, t2.email FROM ( SELECT t.id, t.work_order_num, t.title, t.email_content, t.send_status, t.is_delay, t.delay_send_time, t.send_time, t.attachment, t.created_time, tt.`name` AS creator, tt.department_name AS departName FROM tb_oa_email t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t1.account, t1.`name`, t3.department_name FROM tb_sys_user t1, tb_sys_user_department_post t2, tb_sys_department t3 WHERE t1.id = t2.user_id AND t2.department_id = t3.id AND t1.record_status = 1 AND t2.record_status = 1 AND t3.record_status = 1 AND t2.is_default = '1' ) tt ON t.creator_account = tt.account WHERE t.record_status = 1 ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.id, t.account, t.`name`, t.email, tt.email_id FROM tb_sys_user t, tb_oa_email_user tt WHERE t.account = tt.user_account AND t.record_status = 1 AND tt.record_status = 1 ) t2 ON t1.id = t2.email_id WHERE t1.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
